channel.title: Pokemon Tower Defense (Addicting)
channel.description:
Game link : http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/566150
This game is so addicting, personally I don't really care for Pokemon but the game is so hard to stop playing. Play it and see what you think.
- Post Pics - Offer Trades - Give out codes
Do anything! Discuss. . .

item.title: Pokemon Tower Defense (Addicting)
item.dc:creator: @R_A_R_E_S R A R E S
item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“Immortal Technique, post:17, topic:408721”][quote author=R A R E S link=topic=510001.msg3702168#msg3702168 date=1312817180]

I love it so far. I keep losing at the Pewter Gym… Oh well, it’s a good thing you don’t lose anything besides your wave when you lose!

You guys playing the red or blue version and what Pokemon did you choose to start with?

I chose version red, and I chose Bulba as my starter (i have all 3 starters now)

If you’re losing at pewter gym get a fighting/water/grass pokemon type.

It gets a lot harder, Vermilion Gym and Diglett’s Cave are the hardest.

I could trade you a shiny staryu or a level 42 (level cap) pokemon if you need.

you have a mid level clafary? lol
[/quote]

I have one level 42 Clefairy,you could have it if you want, I replaced it with ninetales.[/quote]

I’ll take it for a shiny tentacruel

Read full topic

item.title: Pokemon Tower Defense (Addicting)
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

I was about to make a topic about this.
Really fun game, I did that free offer for Ninja-ja and got my 3 free shiny pikas. Almost have all level 42’s, all challenge modes complete, sotry mode complete (so far), and almost all all achievements done.

Here’s a working link, as newgrounds won’t load my profile: http://samdangames.blogspot.com/p/play-ptd_03.html
